Name.description: Application name. Can generally be overridden under specific components.

ConfigServerClientSettings.description: Settings for interacting with Spring Cloud Config Server

ConsulConfig.description: Settings for service discovery and registration with Hashicorp Consul

EurekaConfig.description: Settings for service discovery and registration with Spring Cloud Eureka

IEurekaClientConfig.description: Settings for connection to the Eureka server

IEurekaInstanceConfig.description: Settings for how this application instance should register itself with Eureka

KubernetesConfig.description: Settings for interacing with Kubernetes for Configuration and Service Discovery

KubernetesDiscoveryOptions.description: Settings for using the Kubernetes API for service discovery

Spring.description: General settings for Steeltoe and Spring Cloud-compatible features

SqlServerConfig.description: Settings for Steeltoe Microsoft SQL Server Connector
